Text:
Thank god for the pirate bay!!

Please seed!!!
Excellent Seeder, THANK you from all UK Ex Pats who live abroad.   Eurosports coverage of this event was truly bad, spoiled by what sounded like a microphone only audio feed to the PA system sigh...

thank you encoder and/or uploader! the advertising they disperse throughout the olympics on TV makes the games unwatchable.
TPB FTW!

Please download it. You won't regret it. 

I had some issues  trying to play it on my computer but just use mkvmerge to convert this into MKV that's easier for VLC to handle.
